Html:
Your UI charts are marvelous. I wish you would add Windows Phone 8 support as a target. It would be great to be able to use NuGet and put these charts into a Windows Phone 8 app.

Keep up the great work. You're really onto something here.

igrali wrote:
Silverlight binary works with WP8.
@igrali How did you get it to work? I'm trying the same, but the chart control shows up in the visual studio/blend editor, but its not showing up on the device. Any ideas?

@igrali yes, i'm seeing the same as ninaada. i even tried making a "De.TorstenMandelkow.MetroChart.WP" project targeting WP8.0, and everything builds, and runs, but nothing shows up on the device, just empty space.
